html:
2026-0059
2026-01-30CPC, PSPCFinancial Administration ActOrder appointing auditors of the Canada Post Corporation Order appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as auditor of Canada Post Corporation for the year 2025; and (2) the Auditor General of Canada as Joint auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the year 2025.N/A
subject: Order appointing auditors of the Canada Post Corporation
precis: Order appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario as auditor of Canada Post Corporation for the year 2025; and (2) the Auditor General of Canada as Joint auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the year 2025.
